title: Pixel XL crashes, then bootloop, then starts but crashes again and back to bootloop, and repeat...
content:
Pixel XL crashes out of nowhere. Enters bootloop, not even able to get to Restore Mode at first. But eventually able to, and phone restarts.. only to freeze again after a couple minutes and enters bootloop again

Wondering if there's a fix for this, it is probably a software glitch..

And if no fix.. I could do a factory reset, but would like to be able to backup phone content/files/message history first. Would appreciate any tips on how to do this with the phone in its current shape...

Thanks in advance!
